title: This Love
description: Jane awakens in a hospital alone with no memory that she isn't human. She's smuggled away before the doctors discover her rapid healing by another wolf named Dirk. Longing for a life that she doesn’t have because she has no mate and one she can’t remember, Jane trudges on to find answers. When she does find her mate, will their bond be strong enough to last if her past comes back to haunt her?
author: Bethany Kristen
